description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, and creates an agent that generates movie scripts with structured output. It also demonstrates invoking the agent to produce a response.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, storyline, and rating.

methods.name: structured_output_agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to generate a movie script response based on the input prompt, with streaming options enabled.
